String.Dst: Integrate updates and drivers etc, cleanup WinSxS and Package Cache etc, customize your OS Image, speedup your Windows deployment process.
Dism++,Dism GUI,WinSxS Cleanup,Windows Update Cleanup Tool,System Cleanup,Windows Update Clean,vista,win7,win8,win8.1,win10,Chuyu,dism,Add Updates,Windows
Dism++, probably the most powerful utility
The world's first DISM GUI implementation based on CBS!
Dism++ can be considered as a GUI frontend of DISM, but it is based on low-level Component Based Servicing (CBS) interface instead of DISM API or DISM Core API.
Open source is not only a spirit, but also a symbol of strength. Check here to view Chuyu Team's Github.
No need to worry about disk free space anymore while installing updates.
At least 33% used space reduction without streamlining your OS Image.
ESD to ISO conversion is never easy like now.
Choose your updates -- and no worries
Backup or restore your system WITHOUT using Windows PE

In fact, we are all quite obsessive to look for a tool that is lightweight, easy-to-use, straightforward, without gabbage and annoyance. We cannot find it, but we didn’t give up as we realize such a dream with our own hands by making Dism++: a small tool that is non-profit and built with pure persistence and enthusiasm.
"wsusscn2.cab" is Dism++ Windows Update database. You can use it by overwriting "Config\wsusscn2.cab".
